citations.narrative:
Two of the rabbit enclosures have feces and hair matted on the floor in the back corners of the enclosures . A
buildup of feces and debris on the floor may result in scalding of the rabbits feet and is not a healthy environment for
the animals. All enclosures must be cleaned with such frequency to prevent a buildup of debris to maintain
husbandry .
CORRECT BY : 2-7-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted by Dr. Pannill- USDA with the owner's parents.

narrative:
3.56(a)(1)
SANITATION. 
Two of the rabbit enclosures have feces and hair matted on the floor in the back corners of the enclosures . A
buildup of feces and debris on the floor may result in scalding of the rabbits feet and is not a healthy environment for
the animals. All enclosures must be cleaned with such frequency to prevent a buildup of debris to maintain
husbandry .
CORRECT BY : 2-7-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted by Dr. Pannill- USDA with  the owner's parents.
